raw_body: DE SILVA – DR. SARA (Former Senior Lecturer at KDU and Associate Professor at Abu-Dhabi University),​ beloved daughter of Dr. P.H.P. de Silva and Junko de Silva,​ beloved wife of Kazuhiro Higashi Charge d’ Affairs at interim of Embassy of Japan in the Republic of Yemen,​ passed away on the 30th of December 2023 at Kamakura General Hospital,​ Japan after brief illness. Funeral will be held in Tokyo on the 9th January 2024.000396
